meanings.definition: Walked proudly with a stiff, erect posture.
meanings.sent1: The peacock strutted around the garden, showing off its colorful feathers.
meanings.sent2: The soldier strutted confidently in his uniform during the parade.
meanings.sent3: The penguin strutted on the ice, pretending to be a fancy dancer.
meanings.sent4: The model strutted down the runway, exuding elegance and grace.
meanings.sent5: The rooster strutted in the barnyard, commanding attention with each step.

meanings.definition: Displayed oneself in a showy or proud manner.
meanings.sent1: She strutted into the party wearing a glamorous gown.
meanings.sent2: The actor strutted on stage, basking in the applause of the audience.
meanings.sent3: The cat strutted along the fence, acting like the king of the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The CEO strutted through the office, radiating confidence and authority.
meanings.sent5: The athlete strutted across the finish line, celebrating victory with a triumphant pose.
